title: Cherchez L'idole = Look for the Idol
description: A young man is pushed into a dare by a girlfriend and has to steal a piece of jewellery. Interrupted in the act by nosy neighbors, he must abandon the gems in a guitar at a music shop. When he returns later to get hold of the jewels, the guitar has been sold. Musical performances by the 'pop idols' of the era: Charles Aznavour, Nancy Holloway, Johnny Hallyday, Sylvie Vartan and Frank Alamo.  Credits: Producer, Mario Chabert ; director, Michel Boisrond ; writers, Annette Wademant, Michel Balducci ; photography, Raymond Lemoigne ; music, Georges Garvarentz. Cast: Frank Fernandel, Berthe Granval, Dany Saval, Mylene Demongeot, Johnny Halliday.
